title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Source Code classifier

description.newValue:
,The enhanced Source Code trainable classifier includes support for partial/embedded code in Office files, support for 23+ programming languages and 30+ extensions, and high accuracy and low noise with as low as 20 lines of code. This classifier can be used by auto-labeling and data loss prevention policies to detect source code across the digital estate.
GA date: February CY2023
Preview date: January CY2023
